00042   class Event : public ReferenceCount {
00043 
00044   public:
00045 
00046     enum Type { CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED, DISCONNECT, MESSAGE, ERROR, TIMER };
00047 
00063     Event(Type ct, int cid, struct sockaddr_in &a, int err=0,
00064           Header::Common *h=0)
00065       : type(ct), addr(a), conn_id(cid), error(err), header(h) {
00066       if (h != 0) {
00067         message = ((uint8_t *)header) + header->header_len;
00068         message_len = header->total_len - header->header_len;
00069         if (header->gid != 0)
00070           thread_group = ((uint64_t)conn_id << 32) | header->gid;
00071         else
00072           thread_group = 0;
00073       }
00074       else {
00075         message = 0;
00076         message_len = 0;
00077         thread_group = 0;
00078       }
00079     }
00080 
00086     Event(Type ct, int err=0) : type(ct), error(err) {
00087       header = 0;
00088       message = 0;
00089       message_len = 0;
00090       thread_group = 0;
00091       conn_id = 0;
00092     }
00093 
00096     ~Event() {
00097       delete [] header;
00098     }
00099
